reference.title: Lemon Gelato
reference.shortdesc: This delicious and refreshing gelato is a tart and creamy treat! Read on to learn how to replicate it in your classroom's ice cream machine.

ol.li: Combine the cream and 1 cup of the whole milk in a medium saucepan
Set over medium/medium-low heat and bring to a simmer
Whisk the remaining whole milk, lemon zest, sugar, cornstarch, salt and vanilla in a small mixing bowl
Add the milk/sugar mixture to the simmering cream/milk mixture and stir until fully combined
Stir continuously until mixture comes to a strong simmer and thickens slightly so that it coats the spoon you're using to mix.
Stir in pectin, strain, and cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours.
Pour the mixture through the easy-lock lid with ingredient spout and cover it with the cap with measuring cup.
